channel.title: Impossible to obtain Regular status after getting it
channel.description:
Right now, it is impossible to keep the Regular level, as the requirement for it was too harsh.
So what I suggest is that either we take the requirement down for keeping the Regular status, or take up the requirement to get regular status, but keep it permanent, unless the user got banned/suspended.
---
So after 4 month...
I still haven't got my status back.
Can someone look into it.

item.title: Impossible to obtain Regular status after getting it

item.source: Impossible to obtain Regular status after getting it

item.title: Impossible to obtain Regular status after getting it
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Yeah Dylan probably forgot about it, “regulars” have been disabled aka you need more than 31 active days a month to get it. It was removed because it had powers that no one really needed and could very easily be abused.

Read full topic
